```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
wnba_shots <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/36-SURE/36-SURE.github.io/main/data/wnba_shots.csv")
```

```{r}
wnba_shots <- wnba_shots |>
  group_by(shooting_team) |>
  mutate(home_or_away = if_else(shooting_team == home_team_name, "Home", "Away"),
         attempted_point_value = ifelse(str_detect(desc, "Free Throw | free throw"), 1,
                             ifelse(str_detect(desc, "three point | 20:100"), 3, 2))) 

```

```{r}
wnba_shots |>
  select(shooting_team, home_or_away, attempted_point_value, shot_value, made_or_missed) |>
  group_by(shooting_team, home_or_away, shot_value, attempted_point_value) |>
  summarise(count = n())
  
  
```
